txt.en: Fight waves of Wargs as they attack our buddy!
Talk to Cedivor by the door
DNT - This is the FIGHT ME event!

'Where is he? He must be – What’s that? No, I was not saying anything to you. Just pondering under my breath, heh heh. Where are they, I was saying. The... uh, magnificent crafts-hobbits who once called this hovel… eh, these splendid tunnels their home.'
Cedivor has paused to speak with you before a closed door.
'Follow me if you want to live.'
Cedivor continues his way through the tunnels, remarking upon the walls and cobwebs.
'Now I shall kill Wargs too! Follow me!'
'What do you think is beyond this door? Shall we find out?\n\n'Ah, you first! Just in case there are more of those awful beasts waiting.'
'Oh dear! Wargs? I was not expecting that at all!'
Historian is waiting to talk to you.
You defended Cedivor from the Wargs!
'Have you examined the body? Perhaps it has some clues as to what happened down here.'
DNT - You found a strange carved stone
Follow the Historian to the future
Historian wants you to kill some Wargs.
Tell Historian you killed the Wargs
Cedivor Hedgerow waits for you near Glynafon.
'This is astonishing! Just look at these walls, [placeholder]! This simply must be the warrens, ah, hallowed halls of ancient Glynafon!'
Protect Historian while you battle Wargs.
'I do believe I could spend decades just marvelling at the details here. But come, let us return to Amdân before more of the enemy comes looking for their friends.'
You found a strangely carved stone!
Cedivor lurks in the shadows, waiting for you to investigate the room.
The stone clatters to the floor as Cedivor falls
Search for a way out of the room
You have discovered a body in the crumbling tunnels of Glynafon. You should investigate the body for clues.
'Get ready to defend against waves of enemies!'

'What have you found there, my friend? How interesting! Did you find anything of import on his… uh, their body?'

You show him the stone. A queer gleam flashes across his eyes.

'How strange this object is! I should keep it for my research. Well now, I think we can return to the surface. Whatever killed Ragnal may still be down here.'

'How do you know his name,' you ask, readying your weapon.

'What? His… ah, well, I suppose I do not need you anymore, now that I have what I came for. You will live to tell no one what you found here!'
Follow and protect Cedivor as he investigates the ruins
'Have you examined the body? Perhaps it has some clues as to what happened down here.'
Cedivor would be interested in examining the strange stone you found on the body of the fallen man.
Cedivor Hedgerow, renowned historian and artifact expert, seeks protection while he delves into the crumbling halls of Glynafon.
'What would I have done without you? Come, let us press on! I suspect we are close!'
Deception! Cedivor turned out to be a knave and thief and is now attempting murder! Of you! You should defeat him.
You have defeated Cedivor Hedgerow and regained the strange stone. You should look for a way out of the room.
Cedivor continues his way through the tunnels, remarking upon the walls and cobwebs.

'Where is he? He must be – What’s that? No, I was not saying anything to you. Just pondering under my breath, heh heh. Where are they, I was saying. The... uh, magnificent crafts-hobbits who once called this hovel… eh, these splendid tunnels their home.'

'What have you found there, my friend? How interesting! Did you find anything of import on his… uh, their body?'

You show him the stone. A queer gleam flashes across his eyes.

'How strange this object is! I should keep it for my research. Well now, I think we can return to the surface. Whatever killed Ragnal may still be down here.'

'How do you know his name,' you ask, readying your weapon.

'What? His… ah, well, I suppose I do not need you anymore, now that I have what I came for. You will live to tell no one what you found here!'
DNT - OLD INSTANCE DO NOT USE Instance: The Crumbling Halls of Glynafon
